downloadTitle: Windows Mobile Updates for Daylight Saving Time (Windows Mobile 2003 for Pocket PC)
downloadDescription: This is the Microsoft Mobile update to address DST related issues in 2007.
detailsSection: This release updates time zone registry data for US, Canada, Mexico DST related issues in 2007. For complete details regarding the updates in this release, please download the DST2007.CAB file below.
systemRequirementsSection: Windows Mobile 2003 SW for Pocket PC.
systemRequirementsSection_supportedOS: Windows Mobile 2003 software for Pocket PCs
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the download above to download the file.
2. Please copy the file to the device and click on it to execute it. (There are multiple ways to copy a file to the device - one of them is to use Activesync).
